main event: A UFO sighting report indicated the observation of a bolide over California on October 7, 1960.
interesting points: The object was observed using ground-radar.,The observation lasted for 4 seconds.,The object was descending and appeared much larger than an aircraft.,It was described as a yellowish ball with a long glaring tail.,The report suggests that the sighting is characteristic of a meteoric bolide.
sighted object: a large yellowish ball with a long glaring tail
location: 250 Mi W of San Francisco, California, USA
